resources.string: This Graphical User Interface will display different data from the calorimeter: the power dissipated by the Joule effect, the flow and different temperatures measured by the calorimeter (hot temperature, cold temperature and between both).
The power is counted in kW (tens +units + 2 decimals)
The flow rate is counted in m3 / hour (units + 2 decimals)
The temperatures is counted in Â° C (tens + units + 1 decimal)
